[C] All your other "Miyuki, Love Consultation" gain +1500 Power and "[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character from hand to the Waiting Room.]".
[A] BOND/"Miyuki, Love Consultation" [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[S] [(1)] Choose 1 of your ::Shuchiin:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[C] All your other ::Shuchiin:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top 3 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room.

[C] If you have no other ::Shuchiin:: Characters, this does not Stand during your Stand Phase.
[C] This cannot Side Attack.
--None--

[A] When this attacks, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your other ::Shuchiin:: Characters.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a ::Shuchiin:: Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, all your ::Shuchiin:: Characters gain +500 Power and +1 Soul for the turn.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +2 Soul.

[A] [(2)] When this is placed from Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Shuchiin:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[C] If there are 5 or more cards in your hand, this gains +2000 Power.

[C] If there are 3 or fewer cards in your Stock, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Shuchiin:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other ::Shuchiin:: Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[A] CX COMBO At the beginning of your Encore Step, if "Blessed with Myself" is in your Climax Zone, you have 6 or less cards in your hand, and this is in your Front Row, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Shuchiin:: Character from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your ::Shuchiin:: Characters.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 1 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] All your other ::Shuchiin:: Characters gain +1000 Power.
[S] [(1) Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] Choose a Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] If this is in the Front Row, all your ::Shuchiin:: Characters gain +1500 Power.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, put the bottom 3 cards of your Opponent's Library into their Waiting Room, and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X equals the number of Climax cards among those cards. (Damage Cancel can occur)
Look at up to X cards from top of your Library, choose up to 2 of them and put them in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. X = # of your ::Shuchiin:: Characters.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Shuchiin:: Character, choose 1 of your Characters, that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn. (Put the revealed card back where it was)
[A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library in your Clock] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Level 1 or lower Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] If all your Characters are ::Shuchiin::, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When "Yo! Man!" is placed to your Climax Zone, if you have another ::Shuchiin:: Characters, for the turn this gains 1 of the following 2 abilities of your choice. "[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your Opponent's Front Row Cost 0 or lower Characters, put it in their Waiting Room, and for the turn this gains +1000 Power." "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may choose a Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand."
[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a "Love Detective" in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Shuchiin:: Characters, this gains +4000 Power.
[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, all players return all cards in their Waiting Rooms to their respective Libraries, then shuffle those Libraries.

[C] For each of your other ::Shuchiin:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Shuchiin:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.
[C] Character Opposite this gets -1 Soul.
[A] CX COMBO [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, if "Eating Ramen" is in your Climax Zone and you have another ::Shuchiin:: Character, you may pay cost. Id so, choose up to 1 of your Opponent's Characters, return it to their hand, and you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Shuchiin:: Characters, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] [(1) At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may pay cost. If so, move this to an empty Slot in the Back Row.

[C] All your other ::Shuchiin:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose up to 1 of your Opponent's Characters and Send it to Memory, and your Opponent puts that Character from Memory to any Slot on their Stage.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have no other ::Shuchiin:: Characters, put this in the Waiting Room.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, choose up to 1 ::Shuchiin:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] [Discard 2 cards from your hand to the Waiting Room] When you use the BACKUP of this, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters whose Level is higher than the Level of your Opponent and put it in the Waiting Room.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 1000, Level 1 [Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] If all your Characters are ::Shuchiin::, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] [(1)] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, perform Trigger Check twice during this attack's Trigger Step.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 3 cards from top of your Library, put them on top of your Library in any order, and choose up to 1 of your Opponent's Characters and return that Character to their hand.
[S] [Discard a "Love Detective" from hand to the Waiting Room] Choose up to 2 Characters, and for the turn those Characters gains +2000 Power.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's either a ::Shuchiin:: Character or an Event, put it in your hand, and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put the revealed card back where it was)
[A] When this becomes Reversed in Battle, you may choose a card in your Opponent's Clock and put it in the Waiting Room. If so, your Opponent puts the top card of their Library in the Clock.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Shuchiin:: Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your other ::Shuchiin:: Characters.

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[C] ASSIST All your Level 3 or higher Characters in front of this gain +2000 Power.
[A] When your Opponent uses BRAINSTORM and the effect puts at least 1 Climax card in the Waiting Room, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[C] If you have 4 or more ::Shuchiin:: Characters, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] CX COMBO [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, if "Runaway" is in your Climax Zone and all of your Characters are ::Shuchiin:: you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 2 ::Shuchiin:: Characters, show them to your Opponent, put them in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

If you don't have a Character with "Chika" in name, you cannot play this from hand.
Look at up to 4 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 1 ::Shuchiin:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.
You may choose a Cost 0 or lower Character in your Opponent's Front Row and return it to hand.

If you do not have a Character with "Miyuki" or "Yu" in name, you cannot play this from hand.
Choose 1 of the following 3 effects and perform it.
"For the turn all of your Characters gain +1 Soul."
"Choose up to 5 of your Opponent's Characters and Send it to Memory, and your Opponent puts those Characters from Memory to different Slots on their Stage."
"If your Opponent has 5 or more cards in Memory, your Opponent takes all Characters in their Memory and puts them in their Waiting Room."

Choose 1 of your ::Shuchiin:: Characters, and that Character gains +3000 Power for the turn.
Put this in your Stock.
All players reveal the top card of their Library. If the Level of your card revealed by this effect is higher than the Level of the card revealed by this effect of your Opponent's, choose a ::Shuchiin:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand. If the Opponent's is higher, your Opponent chooses 1 of their Characters and for the turn that Character gains +5000 Power. (Climax cards are considered Level 0. Put the revealed cards back)
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, choose 1 of your other ::Shuchiin:: Characters, Rest it and move it to an empty Slot in the Back Row.
[A] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may put the top card of your Library into the Waiting Room. If that card is a ::Shuchiin:: Character or "Love-Brain Battle", you may move this to a vacant Front Row Slot.

[C] For each of your other ::Shuchiin:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [(3) Discard 2 cards from hand to the Waiting Room] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Rebellion Against Society" is in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, do the following twice. "Deal X Damage to your Opponent. X equals the number of 'Love Detective' in your Waiting Room." (Damage Cancel can occur)

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +4500 Power and the following ability until the next end of your Opponent's turn. "[C] In Battles involving this, neither player may use BACKUP."
[A] EXPERIENCE [(2) Discard a card from hand to Waiting Room] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if the sum of the Levels of cards in your Level Zone is 4 or more, you may pay cost. If so, you may put that Character in their Clock.

[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a "Devil Training Camp" in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
[A] At the start of your Opponent's Draw Phase, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 1 or higher, you may return this to your hand. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Put the revealed card back where it was)

[A] When your Character's Trigger Check reveals a Climax card, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] [(1)] This ability activates up to once per turn. When a card is placed in your Level Zone, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Shuchiin:: Character from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +2000 Power.
[A] [Discard a card from Hand to Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Event, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When you play an Event, choose 1 of your ::Shuchiin:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, put the top card of your Clock in your Stock.

[C] All your other ::Shuchiin:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[A] [(1)] When your Character's Trigger Check reveals a Climax with a Bag Trigger Icon, you may pay cost. If so, draw a card.

[C] Your other "Kaguya, Vice-President" and "Kaguya, Anxieties and Expectations" gain +500 Power.
[S] CX COMBO BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each "Blessed By Myself" and/or "I Can't Hear the Sound of Fireworks" revealed this way, search your Library for up to 1 ::Shuchiin:: Characters, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +1000 Power.

[A] CX COMBO [Discard a "President's Pride" or "Much Better..." from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage you may pay cost if so, choose a "President's Pride" or "Much Better..." in your Waiting Room and return it to hand.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Cost of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Shuchiin:: Characters, this gains +1500 Power and "[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character from hand to the Waiting Room]".
[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When you play an Event, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[C] ASSIST All your ::Shuchiin:: Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.

[C] EXPERIENCE If the total level of cards in your Level Zone is 5 or higher, this card gains +3000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When "President's Pride" is placed in your Climax Zone, if this is in the Front Row, choose up to 1 ::Shuchiin:: Character in your Waiting Room, place it to Stock, and until the next end of your Opponent's turn, this gains +1500 Power.

[C] Your other "Kei, Killing Hello Return" gain +1 Level and the following ability. "[C] On your turn for each of your ::Shuchiin:: Characters this gains +500 Power."

[S] [(1)] Put the top card of your Opponent's Library in the Waiting Room, and choose a card in your Opponent's Waiting Room and put it on top of the Library.

[A] [Rest 1 of your other ::Shuchiin:: Characters] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a card in your Level Zone and a card in your Waiting Room and swap them.
[A] At the beginning of your Climax Phase, your Opponent may put the top 2 cards of their Stock in the Waiting Room. If they do, for the turn, this cannot Front Attack.

[C] EXPERIENCE If the sum of Levels of cards in your Level Zone is 2 or higher, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When you play an Event, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[C] For each of your other ::Shuchiin:: Characters in the Back Row, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Much Better..." is in the Climax Zone, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Shuchiin:: Character, put it in your hand. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
